name: Gloomy Gloves
data: It decreases the users strength pathetically.
It decreases the users dexterity pitifully.
It decreases the users constitution unnoticably.
It increases the users wisdom poorly.
It increases the users intelligence slightly.
It has low armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pathetically.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
